description: PostHog, JavaScript Interview Questions, Free Programming Books, grep.app and more...

items.title: PostHog
items.description: Open source product analytics with feature tracking and funnels.

items.title: JavaScript Interview Questions: Common Gotchas
items.description: A nice article by Stephen Hartfield about the gotchas in interview questions about JavaScript.

items.title: 5 Top Free Programming Books for Front-End Developers
items.description: A list of books for the self-taught front-end developer.

items.title: grep.app
items.description: A tool to search across git repos with the ability to use regex.

items.title: 7 Ways To Make Sure Your Website is ADA Compliant
items.description: An article by Carol Sankar about the things you can do to make your website accessible.

items.title: DesignValley
items.description: A big tool depository for things all around design.

items.title: Vue.js: The Documentary
items.description: A documentary by Honeypot about the story of Vue.js.

items.title: Announcing TypeScript 3.8
items.description: The article by Microsoft about the new release of TypeScript 3.8.

items.title: Google Lighthouse for Firefox
items.description: Google Lighthouse just published its plugin for the Firefox browser.
